short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Awesome extension that makes managing Content Hub easier!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension safe you a lot of clicks on a daily basis when working with Sitecore Content Hub. It has direct links to the most used Management function with in the Content Hub.
